content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These courses are an introduction to the essentials of business analysis and requirements management. The overall goal is to help you effectively perform BA duties and solve typical problems that BAs face in real world.  It is based on practical experience, real project examples and best practices collected, systematized and outlined in a simple, understandable, and informal manner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To-Do: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"View Courses \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=8f8d7d32-2d8c-4dc1-95d2-b4754d2ad97c\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=8f8d7d32-2d8c-4dc1-95d2-b4754d2ad97c\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business Analysis Foundations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=ca36f9f3-9abe-4c61-84e6-4fb9df999320\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Agile Requirements Foundations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]}}"
